text: Mu mpinduka zo kuva ku isiganwa rya kimwe cya kane ujya kuri kimwe cya kabiri cya mayili, kwihangana bihinduka ihame ridakuka.
Reba ni izihe ngendo icyo kigo kirimo guteza imbere, yaba ku rubuga cyangwa ahagaragarira ibyo bakora.
Abaturage b’Umujyi wa Vatikani bagera kuri 800. Ni cyo gihugu gito cyane cyigenga mu isi ndetse n’igihugu gituwe n’abaturage bake cyane.
Igerageza rya Herishey na Chase ryabaye kimwe mu byifuzonama by'ingenzi ko ADN yari igikoresho cy’ibimenyetso ndangakoko.
Ibirwa bya Cook, ni igihugu cy’ikirwa mu bufatanye busesuye na New Zealand, giherereye muri Polineziya, hagati y’Inyanja ya Pasifike y’Amajyepfo.
Niba ushaka kwiga gutera umujugujugu ugaruka mu maboko yawe, menya neza ko ufite umujugujugu ubereye kugaruka.

Gusiganwa mu guserebeka ku rubura nka siporo byatangiye byibuze mu kinyejana cya 17, ndetse mu 1861 hafunguwe ikipe yo guserebeka ku rubura ya mbere y’imyidagaduro yafunguwe n’Abanyanoruveje muri Ositaraliya.
Ni imwe mu by’ingenzi bikurura ba mukerarugendo muri Afurika y’Epfo kandi ifatwa nk’ikirango cya Pariki Nkuru z’ Afurika y’Epfo (SANParks).
Umuzika akenshi ufatwa hakoreshejwe mudasobwa zihambaye kugira ngo zitunganye kandi zihuze amajwi.
Urugero, umuntu umwe ashobora kuvuga ko imodoka iba iganisha ku iterambere ry’imihanda byanze bikunze.
Amakamyo atwara imyanda yakoreshejwe mu guhagarika imiyoboro yinjira kandi hari ubufasha bw’abapolisi 80 ngo bayobore abatwara amapikipiki aho bagomba kunyura.
Muganga Tony Moll yavumbuye umuti ukaze wo Kurwanya Igituntu (XDR-TB) mu karere ka South Africa KwaZulu-Natal.
Jenerali James Ewing yari gufata umutwe w’abitwara gisirikare 700 hakurya y’umugezi kuri Trenton Ferry, agafata ikiraro kiri kuri Asunpink Ceek kandi akabuza ingabo izo arizo zose z’umwanzi guhunga.
Ijambo safari mu mikoresherezwe izwi riganisha ku ngendo zo ku butaka mu kureba inyamaswa z’agasozi zitangaje muri Afurika, by’umwihariko mu ishyamba.
MetroRail ifite ibyiciro bibiri bya gari ya moshi zo mu mujyi wa Cape Town no mu nkegero: MetroPlus (nanone yitwa Icyiciro cya Mbere) na Metro (bita Icyiciro cya Gatatu).
Akaremangingo biva ku ijambo ry’Ikilatini cella risobanura icyumba gitoya.
Urwungano rw’imyakura rukomeza gushyiraho iringaniza rwohereza umusuniko w’imyakura mu mubiri wose kugira ngo umuvumba w’amaraso agenda ukomeze ubudahagarara.
Alloys ni imvange zigizwe mu buryo bw’ibanze n’uruvange rw’ibyuma bibiri cyangwa byinshi. Ntiwibagirwe ko hari elema nyinshi ku mbonerahamwe y’ibihe.
Muri iki gitaramo hagaragayemo amajwi y’umwimerere y’abakinyi b’ikinamico, hafi ya Texas y'uburasirazuba.
Ubwo yari mu kiganiro avuga kuri ubwo buryo bushya yaravuze ko “buteye ikibazo cyane kandi buraburira kubera umubare w’abahitanwa nabwo."
34 ku ijana by'ababajijwe bahuriye kuri iki gitekerezo, bifuza ko Umwamikazi Elizabeth wa II yaba umwami wa nyuma w’Ubwami bwa Ositaraliya.
Kuzamuka imisozi ku manywa haba harimo intera iri munsi ya mayilo imwe kugeza ku ntera ndende ishobora kugendwa mu munsi umwe gusa.

Siporo yo kugenda mu rubura, irimo guserebekera ku rubuga no kugendera ku kabaho ka shelegi, ni siporo zizwi cyane zirimo guserebeka ahantu h'urubura hamwe hakoreshejwe ski cyangwa ikibaho cya shelegi gifatanye n'ibirenge.
Ukurikije iki gisigazwa, bivuze ko gutandukana bikiri kare cyane kuruta uko byari byateganijwe n’ibimenyetso bya molekile.
Niba usuye Greenland mu bihe by’ubukonje (uzirikane ko uko urushaho kujya mu majyaruguru, ni ko hazarushaho gukonja), ni ngombwa kwitwaza imyenda ishyuha bihagije.
Uburyo bworoshye cyane bwo gutangira mu bikorwa by’ubwanditsi ku ngendo ni ugutyaza ubumenyi bwawe ku rubuga rw’amakuru agezweho y’ingendo.

Koko rero, nta gushidikanya ko kode z’uturere nta ngaruka zigira ku gucapurura bitemewe n’amategeko; kopi ya disike uko yakabaye izavuga neza ku gikoresho icyo aricyo cyose nk’uko disike y’umwimerere izavuga.
Indwara ikwirakwizwa n'ingurube, hanyuma ikimukira mu bantu inyuze imibu.
Zagaragaraga nk’ibyumba. Yabaye umuntu wa mbere witegereje utugirangingo twapfuye.
Umujyi wa Beijing mu Bushinwa ni wo uzaba umujyi wakira Imikino y’Itumba ya Olempiki mu 2022, bikazawugira umujyi wa mbere wakiriye Olempikiz’impeshyi n’iz’itumba.
Ikiraro cy’Umugezi wa Oyapock ni ikiraro cy’intsinga zihoraho. Cyambukiranya Umugezi wa Oyapock mu guhuza imijyi ya Oiapoque muri Burezile na Saint-Georges de l’Oyapock muri Guiana y’u Bufaransa.
Abantu benshi babikisha imyanya yabo mbere (kubera ko ubwato buhora bwuzuye mu gihembwe cyo gusohoka).
Hoteli zibanda cyane ku bantu b’urubyiruko – abashyitsi bihariye bari mu myaka makumyabiri – ariko ushobora no kuhabona abatembera benshi bakuze.
Inyinshi mu nsengero zifite Iserukiramuco Ngarukamwaka ritangira mu Ugushyingo rikarangira hagati muri Gicurasi, bikagenda bitandukana ugendeye ku ngengabihe y’urusengero y’umwaka.
Abahanga bamwe batekereza dinazoru zo mu bwoko bwa Tiriseratopu zatungwaga n’ibimera byitwa saikadi, ubwoko bw’ibimera byari byiganje gihe cya Keretase.
Ku saha ya saa 11:20, abapolisi basabye abigaragambyaga gusubira inyuma kuri kaburimbo, bakomeza bavuga ko bashaka uko uburenganzira bwo kwigaragambya bwakubahirizwa ariko n’ibinyabiziga bigakomeza.
Indi mikino ijyanye no kugendera ku rubura izabera ku gace k’urubura ka Taizicheng Zhangjiakou, hafi kilometero 220 (mayilo 140) uvuye i Beijing.
Umuntu uwo ari we wese uteganya gusura igihugu gifatwa nk’agace k’intambara agomba guhabwa amahugurwa ya kinyamwuga.

Umubumbe uzenguruka ukwezi wa Chandrayaan-1 watangiye Ubushakashatsi bwawo bwo ku kwezi (MIP), kwazengurutse hejuru y’ukwezi kuri kilometero 1,5 ku isegonda (mayili 3000 mu isaha), maze icyogajuru cyasandaye kigwa hafi n’igice cy’amajyepfo y’ukwezi.
Byongeye kandi, mu bihe by’ubushyuhe bagiteri zororoka vuba kandi zikabaho igihe kirekire ziri hanze y’umubiri.
Rimwe na rimwe inzobere mu ngendo zo mu kirere zijyamo imbere, kugirango zizamuke imisozi cyangwa kugera ku Nkingi, ifite urufatiro rinini.
Icyo kimera gitanga nerotokisine ishobora guhagarika imitsi haba mu bantu no mu mafi.
Igihe cya Three Kingdoms cyari kimwe mu gihe cyamenetsemo amaraso mu mateka y'Ubushinwa bwa kera abantu ibihumbi bapfuye barwanira kwicara ku ntebe z’icyubahiro mu ngoro nkuru ya Xi'an.
Nujya imusozi ukoresheje gusa ingendo zo mu bwato ntabwo uzakenera viza yihariye (guhera muri 2009).
Ubushakashatsi butanga kandi ubushishozi mu mihindagurikire y’amababa y’inyoni.
Dr. Moll atekereza ko abarwayi bamwe bashobora kuba baranduye iyo ndwara mu bitaro, kandi byibuze babiri bari abashinzwe ubuzima mu bitaro.
Iyo wajyaga mu mahanga bwa mbere, abantu bashoboraga wenda kwihangana no gusobanukirwa, bazi ko abakora ingendo mu gihugu gishya bagomba kugira babanza kumenyera.
Ubucukumbuzi kuri bariyeri z’umutekano na wo bwarushijeho kwinjirwamo mu bihe bya nyuma ya tariki 11 Nzeli, 2001.
Ubu abantu bandika ubutumwa kuri ekara za mudasobwa, nta na rimwe bakenera kwiyegereza icyo gusongoresha ikaramu y’igiti.
Abashakashatsi bavuze ko, nubwo uyu ari umurizo wa dinazoru ikiri nto, ubushakatsatsi bw’ibanze bwerekana ko ari ibaba rikuze ntabwo ari ibaba ryo hasi ry’inyoni.
Urwego rwa pH rwerekanwa n’ingano ya Hydrogene (H muri pH) ion bikomoka ku binyabutabire byapimwe.
Ikibabaje ariko, iyo uri gukora DVD, akenshi umuzenguruko wayo na wo uzakatwa, ndetse niba iyo videwo yari ifite ibisobanuro byegereye cyane igice cyo hasi, ntabwo bizagaragara byose uko byakabaye.
Nta gutinda mu muvundo w’imodoka gukabije byavuzwe kuri umuhanda, undi muhanda winjira mu mujyi.
Mu munsi yazo harimo injangwe zifite ubunini bugereranyije zihiga inyamaswa zinganiye kuva ku nkwavu kugeza ku mpongo n’isiha.
Nta raporo y’ako kanya y’ibyangiritse yahawe Ikigo cy’Amerika gishinzwe ubushakashatsi ku bijyanye n’ubutaka (USGS) n’ikigo cy’igihugu gishinzwe amakuru y’imitingito.
Mu ntangiriro hakoreshwaga imbaho kugira ngo zifate izo nzira aho ziri. Buhoro buhoro, cyakora, byagaragaye ko izo nzira zari gukomera kurushaho iyo ziza kuba zifite umutambiko w’icyuma hejuru.
Ikimenyetso cy’uburozi bwo mu mubiri cyiza kurusha ibindi gishobora kuba igipfunyika gifunguye cy’umuti cyangwa ibintu byo mu rugo byica.
Ibi bitanga amahirwe meza yo kureba Umuseke wo mu majyuruguru y’isi, kubera ko ikirere kizaba cyijimye ahagana mu masaa sita z’ijoro.
Ubuso bwa Turukiya buyigira igihugu cya 37 kinini ku isi, kandi kikaba kingana na Metropolitan France n'Ubwongereza ubuteranyije.

Newt Gingrich, wahoze ari Perezida w'inteko ishingamategeko umutwe w'abadepite, Rick Perry, guverineri wa Texas, n'umudepite witwa Michele Bachmann barangije ku mwanya wa kane, uwa gatanu, n'uwa gatandatu uko bakurikirana.
Iyo ngirwakarwa iherereye kuri 120 km mu majyaruguru y’uwo Mwigimbakirwa. Ikinini ni Ikirwa cy’Umwami Joruje irimo umudugudu wa Vila Lasi Esiterelasi.
Perezida wa Leta Zunze Ubumwe za Amerika, George W. Bush, yishimiye iri tangazo.
Hari amatandukaniro atagira ingano ashoboka, ariko ibi bikomeza kuba ibyo abantu benshi baba bashaka kuvuga igihe bavuga "kujya mu Isi ya Disney".

Intego nkuru z’Ubutaliyani zari ku bihugu bya Afurika. Kugira ngo hafatwe ibyo bihugu, bari kuba bakeneye ingabo zirasa, kugira ngo ingabo zishobore kwambuka inyanja ya Mediterane maze zitere muri Afurika.
Amakipe ari mu cyiciro cyo hejuru cy’irushanwa muri Afurika y’Epfo yatangiye neza ubwo batsinze bitabagoye ibitego 26 - 00 ubwo bakinaga n’ikipe iri mu cyiciro cya 5 yo muri Zambiya.
Muri gare, basubiye i Paris bakikijwe n'imbaga y'ikivunge cy’abantu bavuza induru kandi bavuga amagambo yo gutera ubwoba Umwami n'Umwamikazi.
Amir Khan watsindiye umudari w’umuringa mu mikino Olempike ya 2004 yaravuze ati: "Byimbitse ndatekereza ko abagore batagomba kuhangana. Niko njye mbyumva."
Beijing izakira ibirori bifungura n’ibisoza n’ibitaramo byo gutangiza ibyo bikorwa.
Iri hame rivuguruza ibivugwa ko ukwezi kutagira ibikorwa bya gibikorwa bishingira ku mabuye n’ubutaka.
Hariho imiterere myinshi itandukanye y’amaso, irutanwa mu bukomere bitewe n’ibisabwa n’umubiri.
Agace ka Schengen, icyakora, hari ukuntu gakora nk’igihugu kimwe muri ubu buryo.
Mu myaka y’1960, Brzezinski yakoreye John F. Kennedy nk'umujyanama we maze nyuma ajya mu buyobozi bwa Lyndon B. Johnson.
Mu mwaka wa 1957, Lugizamburu yabaye umunyamuryango washinze umuryango kuri ubu uzwi nk’umuryango w’ubumwe bw’ibihugu by’Uburayi.
Inkuru yerekanwe mu muziki w’Ubufaransa, na Camille Saint-Saens, ni iy'umuhanzi "ubuzima bwe bwabaswe no gukunda ibiyobyabwenge n’Ubuyapani."
Ku ikubitiro amaze gutsindwa urugamba, Etelirede yashoboye kumvikana na Olafe, wagarutse muri Noruveje kugerageza gufata ubwami bwe mu buryo butamuhiriye cyane.
Yaje kwimurirwa mu bitaro bya Addenbrooke i Cambridge nyuma.
Igihe cy’ubukerarugendo bwo ku masitasiyo yo ku misozi ubusanzwe kigira abantu benshi cyane mu mpeshyi yo mu Buhinde.
Ibindi birimo Ikirwa cya Livingisitone, na Desebusiyo aho karateri yuzuyemo amahindure y’ikirunga kikiruka igize icyambu nyaburanga gitangaje.

Mu rindi rushanwa rye, rya Giant Slalom, yarangije ku mwanya wa cumi mu cyiciro cy’abagore bafite impuzandengo y’igihe cyo kwiruka cya 4: 41.30, 2: 11.60 arushwa n’uwambere Umunya Otirishiya Claudia Loesch n’iminota iminota 1: 09.02 asizwe n’uwarangije ku mwanya wa cyenda Gyöngyi Dani wo muri Hongiriya.
Murray yatakaje iseti ya mbere mu mukino wa kamara mpaka nyuma yuko abagabo bombi bananiranywe muri buri seti.
Igitaramo cy’amajwi n’amatara cyo muri piramide ni kimwe mu bintu bishimisha abana cyane muri ako gace.
Mu gihe isakwa ry’abinjira ubusanzwe ritabaho cyangwa ari umuhango gusa igihe ugeze ku butaka bwawe, isaka ryo kuri gasutamo rishobora kuba iteshamutwe.
Iyo uri mu kiruhuko hafi yo mu rugo, uba ufite umwanya wo kwiyitaho ndetse ugafata iminota yindi mike yo kwitegurira ikintu kidasanzwe.
Atome zimwe zigira intimatima zidahama hamwe bisobanuye ko zikunda kwitandukanya iyo habayeho isunikana rito cyangwa nta n'iribayeho.
Ku cyumweru washize, mu ijambo rye abinyujije ku munyamabanga w’itangazamakuru, Perezida wa Leta Zunze za Amerika, Donald Trump yatangaje ko ingabo z’Amerika zari kuva muri Siriya.
Satelite yo mu kirere ibona uko guhamagarwa hanyuma ikagusubiza hasi, hafi ako kanya.
Undi Mugereki uzwi cyane ni umuhanga mu mibare Pythagoras, uzwi cyane kubera ihame rizwi cyane ryerekeye isano z’impande za mpandeshatu ndinganire.

Mu nzu z’urusimbi by’umwihariko hakoreshwa imbaraga nyinshi mu kuzamura igihe n’amafaranga akoreshwa n’abahasuye. Nta madirishya n’amasaha biba bihari ubusanzwe, kandi aho gusohokera ntibiba byoroshye kuhabona.
Mu izinga ry’ibirwa n’ibiyaga ntukeneye cyane ubwato bwo kwishimisha.
Mu cyi, by’umwihariko, uzakenera kwitondera imibu nuhitamo gutemberera mu mashyamba agwamo imvura nyinshi.
Filime, irimo Ryan Gosling na Emma Stone, yagize abatorwanywa mu byiciro byose by’ingenzi.
Ni hafi igice cy’isaha kuzenguruka uwo mudugudu uteye amatsiko.

Muri 1995 yatowe nk'umukinnyi mwiza wabayeho mu mateka ya Partizan.

Muri Rogaland na Agder bakunze kwitwa "hei" bisobanura ubutayu butagira igiti akenshi butwikiriwe n’igisambu.

Ku mibare iri hejuru y’ababajijwe, 29 ku ijana by'abakoreweho ubushakashatsi bemeza ko Ositaraliya igomba guhita ihinduka repubulika, mu gihe 31 ku ijana bemeza ko Ositaraliya itagomba na rimwe kuba repubulika.
